## Flags.ReplaceFactories type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ReplaceFactories<T extends {
        of: any;
        empty: any;
    }, Name extends string, F extends allFlags, Instance> = {
        [key in keyof T]: key extends "of" ? (...flags: Array<F | Name>) => Instance : key extends "empty" ? Instance : T[key];
    };
```
